Defense Donald Rumsfeld . The senator from Arizona gave a terse response Thursday to claims made in Donald Rumsfeld 's new book "Known and Unknown." Donald Rumsfeld had claimed John McCain had a "hair-trigger temper" and a propensity to shift his positions to appeal to the media.
